name: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: A comprehensive introduction to machine learning algorithms, including supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and deep learning fundamentals.

name: Advanced Artificial Intelligence
description: Deep dive into advanced AI topics including natural language processing, computer vision, reinforcement learning, and ethical considerations in AI.

name: Software Engineering Principles
description: Fundamental principles of software engineering including requirements analysis, design patterns, testing methodologies, and project management.

name: Database Systems and Design
description: Comprehensive study of database systems, SQL, NoSQL databases, data modeling, normalization, and database administration.

name: Linear Algebra and Applications
description: Mathematical foundations of linear algebra including vector spaces, matrices, eigenvalues, and applications in data science and engineering.

name: Calculus and Differential Equations
description: Advanced calculus topics and differential equations with applications in physics, engineering, and mathematical modeling.

name: Probability and Statistics
description: Fundamental concepts of probability theory, statistical inference, hypothesis testing, and regression analysis.

name: Data Analysis and Visualization
description: Practical techniques for data analysis, statistical modeling, and data visualization using modern tools and programming languages.

name: Quantum Mechanics I
description: Introduction to quantum mechanics covering wave functions, Schrödinger equation, quantum states, and fundamental principles.

name: Computational Physics
description: Numerical methods and computational techniques for solving physics problems using programming and simulation.

name: Thermodynamics and Statistical Mechanics
description: Principles of thermodynamics, statistical mechanics, and their applications to understanding physical systems.

name: Materials Science Fundamentals
description: Introduction to materials science covering crystal structures, phase diagrams, mechanical properties, and material characterization.

name: Organic Chemistry I
description: Fundamental principles of organic chemistry including structure, bonding, reactions, and mechanisms of organic compounds.

name: Chemical Synthesis and Methodology
description: Advanced topics in chemical synthesis, reaction mechanisms, and modern synthetic methodologies in organic chemistry.

name: Analytical Chemistry
description: Principles and techniques of analytical chemistry including spectroscopy, chromatography, and electrochemical methods.

name: Environmental Chemistry
description: Study of chemical processes in the environment, pollution, environmental monitoring, and sustainable chemistry practices.
